function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Connectivity between districts impacting mortality during influenza pandemic","Impact":"Increased mortality and spread of disease","Mitigation":"Improve transportation and connectivity infrastructure, implement strict public health measures in transit hubs","Technologies":"Transportation monitoring systems, IoT for public health monitoring","People":"Residents of interconnected districts, commuters, public transit users","Owner":"Local governments, public health agencies, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of density and NPIs on infection rates","Impact":"Disproportionate mortality burden for smaller cities, higher infection rates in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implement Non-Pharmaceutical Interventions (NPIs), advocate for compact development, improve access to healthcare","Technologies":"Smart city technology, public health surveillance systems","People":"Residents of densely populated areas, urban planners, local governments","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Impact of socioeconomic factors on pandemic spread","Impact":"Higher susceptibility in large metro areas, disproportionate mortality in deprived populations","Mitigation":"Address socioeconomic inequalities, improve access to healthcare for disadvantaged populations","Technologies":"Healthcare accessibility mapping, community health initiatives","People":"Socioeconomically disadvantaged populations, residents of large metro areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, community advocates"}]}
